typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movieId as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['movies']) ~> MoviesCSV
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['ratings']) ~> RatingCSV
MoviesCSV select(mapColumn(
		movieId,
		title,
		genres
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
RatingCSV select(mapColumn(
		Column_1,
		Column_2,
		Column_3,
		Column_4
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	fileSystem: 'analytics',
	folderPath: 'movies',
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MovieToParquet
Select2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RatingToPrquet
